text: niccayamaka nam jinkaliliruntum, manitarkaliliruntum anekarai narakattirkenre pataittullom; avarkalukku irutayankal irukkinrana - anal avarraik kontu avarkal nallunarvu pera mattarkal; avarkalukkuk kankal untu; anal, avarraik kontu avarkal (iraivanin attatcikalaip) parppatillai avarkalukkuk katukal untu. Anal avarraik kontu avarkal (narpotanaiyaik) ketkamattarkal - ittakaiyor kalnataikalaip ponravarkal. Illai! Avarrai vitavum vali ketarkal; ivarkal tam (namvacanankalai) alatciyam ceytavarkalavarkal
